title: Hattiesburg, Mississippi, Mourns 2 Slain Officers
teaser: Officials arrested four people in the deaths of two young cops. A reporter joins us to talk about reactions in the city.
contentencoded:
Officials arrested four people for the fatal shooting of two police officers in Hattiesburg, Mississippi.

The officers, Benjamin Deen and Liquori Tate, were shot Saturday night during a traffic stop.

A memorial service is scheduled for this afternoon in Hattiesburg.

Clarion-Ledger breaking news reporter Therese Apel speaks with Here & Now‘s Robin Young about how the community is reacting to the shootings.

Guest

  • Therese Apel, Clarion-Ledger Breaking News reporter. She tweets @TRex21.
